answers.answer: You start having high blood pressure vision problems gaining more than 5 pounds in a week. Numbness of the arms hands legs and feet. The doctor will tell you and test for it.

I have all that except High BP I'll gain 5-7lbs and then loose it b4 I go see my doctor it trips me out.. I've only lost about 4lbs in one day. ..I'm also seeing dots and have pressure behind my eye balls...When I go in they say every things normalToday is the most i very seen dots usually its like once in a 3-6 span but today its happened multiple timea

They also check for protein in urine. High blood pressure . Severe swelling of arms, legs and face. Vision blurred. If you have any of these symptoms you should see a doctor right away. I lost my nephew who was almost 4 months premature due to my sister having preeclampsia. He was only 10 days old when he lost his battle.

Well. Get a blood pressure reader. And atart checking your blood.pressure. do you have swelling? Eclampsia and preeclampsia is something the doctors wont miss. I have it. And depending on how severe it is , they will deliver you imediatly or at 37 weeks. I have only gotten to the protein in urin test. Thats a 24 hour test. But since im doing nursing school, and friends with my nurses.. as in we text .. lol. They let me go home on bed rest for the 24 hours. But most people they will put you on hospital bed rest while doing your 24 hour test. And deliver you.. or release you on bed rest and deliver you at 37 weeks.

I have enough protein in my urine they say.. I've had false labor 35weeks.. at my 36week apptthey said I'm not dilated but I'm 50% effaced and just to make sure to stay hyrdrated so my baby stays in till my k37weeks but other wise I'm good to go lol...I have severe swelling in my opinion in my feet, knees and hands.. I get numbness and tingling in my legs and arms every once in awhile for like 20-30mins tops.. my vision blurs every once in awhile.. for the past 3 days I've had pressure behind my eyes and today for a couple times I've seen dots but other wise that's only happened like once a week.. they always say my protein and BP is goodgreat even...As for weight all together I've gained 60lbs according to this ap.. I know I gain like 5lbs a week but always seem to loose it b4 I go to the doctors...
I would call your doctor and explain everything thats happening and see what they say.
If your concern why don't you ask your dr to check for preeclampsia .
I'm going too next week I just wanted to know facts from woman who have it or know about it
